title: Partially Update a booking with valid data

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
When a "PATCH" request is made to update the booking <bookingId> details with the following data:
Then the response status code should be 200
And the updated booking details should match the expected values

scenarioOutline:
When a "PATCH" request is made to update the booking <bookingId> details with the following data:
|firstname | lastname|
|<firstname> | <lastname>|
Then the response status code should be 200
And the updated booking details should match the expected values
|firstname | lastname|
|<firstname> | <lastname>|
